casebody.data:
Nicholas ADAMS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF MOTOR VEHICLES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018

Jonathan Ross Sills, in support of the petition.

Christine Jean-Louis, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 182 Conn. App. 165, 189 A.3d 629 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
